Storage.name: Storage
Storage.description: You are in the storage room. Your stores are kept here.

Dome.name: Dome
Dome.description: You are in the vegetation dome. There is a small park here to relax in, fields for soil-grown food and small animals.

Hydroponics.name: Hydroponics
Hydroponics.description: You are in the hydroponics bay. This is where most of your food is grown.

Barracks.name: Barracks
Barracks.description: You are in the barracks. Here the astronaut's sleeping berths are located.

Hallway.name: Hallway
Hallway.description: You are in the hallway leading to the Vegetation Dome.

Engineering.name: Engineering
Engineering.description: You are in engineering where you see the engine, fuel and life support. You can access the lander from here as well.

Entrance.name: Entrance
Entrance.description: You are in the entrance of the base, leading to the airlock.

Hub.name: Hub
Hub.description: This is the Hub. It connects to the bridge, the barracks and engineering.

Surface.name: Surface
Surface.description: You are moon surface outside of your base.
